last_episode_to_air.name: The Throne of Sargon
last_episode_to_air.overview: A villain from the past breaks into the Paxton Museum and attempts to take control of Alex forever.

name: Curses!
overview: The Vanderhouvens are a typical family...except a curse recently turned Alex—their loving husband and father—to stone. In order to save him, his wife and kids set out on spine-tingling adventures to return ancient artifacts stolen by an ancestor.

seasons.name: Season 2
seasons.overview: The second season picks up with Alex rejoining the family as they continue working to undo the damage done by their greedy ancestors. But when something about Alex doesn't seem quite right, the family must band together to solve the mysteries that confront them, both on the road and within the walls of Briarstone Manor.

tagline: Home is where the cursed, stolen, ancient artifacts are.

episodes.name: The Restricted Wing
episodes.overview: When Alex doesn't return from a family game of hide-and-seek, secrets are revealed about the Vanderhouvens' past, present, and future.

episodes.name: The Golden Baboon Head
episodes.overview: Pandora, Russ, and Sky befriend two unlikely allies—Stanley and Larry—while racing against time to capture a creature on the loose in the manor.

episodes.name: The Baboon Temple
episodes.overview: The Vanderhouvens leave home to search for answers about a cursed artifact from the Congo. But upon arrival, they face unexpected mayhem.

episodes.name: The Olmec Babies
episodes.overview: When three fertility statues come to life, it's up to Russ, Pandora, and Sky to reunite them with their “mother” on display at the Paxton Museum.

episodes.name: The Scryer Bowl
episodes.overview: The Vanderhouvens discover a possible way to contact Alex. But chaos ensues—and Stanley gets caught in the center of it.

episodes.name: The Japanese Painting
episodes.overview: Russ, Sky, Stanley, and Larry navigate a new crisis after Pandora is sucked into a work of art and surrounded by sinister spirits.

episodes.name: The Celtic Cloak
episodes.overview: The Vanderhouvens travel to a stormy Scottish island and cross paths with a puzzling local. Larry and Stanley put their mapmaking skills to the test.

episodes.name: The Memory Box
episodes.overview: In order to get closer to saving Alex, the family must dig into the memories of Cornelius Vanderhouven.

episodes.name: The Aztec Necklace
episodes.overview: Pandora, Russ, and Sky head to the jungles of the Yucatan in search of a powerful witch believed to be in possession of a protective amulet.

episodes.name: The Ruby Hourglass & the Obsidian Sphere
episodes.overview: A major challenge pushes the Vanderhouvens to their limits. Can they overcome the impossible and finally bring Alex back?

episodes.name: The Lantern
episodes.overview: The Vanderhouvens travel to Transylvania and dig deeper into a source of light with dark powers.

episodes.name: The Persian Die Block
episodes.overview: When a curse disrupts Pandora's game night, a manticore crashes the party and presents a suite of risky challenges.

episodes.name: The Ottoman Ship Helm
episodes.overview: Larry leads a mission to honor the final request of an admiral—but his trusty crew faces chaos on the Aegean Sea.

episodes.name: The Rajasthani Puppet
episodes.overview: The Vanderhouvens embark on an emergency trip to India when a menacing marionette takes control of Russ.

episodes.name: The Inuit Glasses and the Peruvian Gourd
episodes.overview: Swirling, strange whispers cycle through the house as the Vanderhouvens search for a possible intruder.

episodes.name: The Goodluck Bridle
episodes.overview: The family head to New Mexico after an Old West artifact reignites a vengeful gang of cowboy spirits.

episodes.name: The Didgeridoo
episodes.overview: Stanley joins the family on an adventure to Australia, where they unpack the surprising history of a cursed musical instrument.

episodes.name: Dr. Terrifico's Strength Tonic
episodes.overview: After a mysterious drink shrinks the Vanderhouven kids, they sprint to escape from Linda the lizard, who thinks they're food.

episodes.name: The Lapis Scarabs
episodes.overview: Sky and the kids confront a crisis that endangers the Restricted Wing—and uncover a horrifying truth about Alex.

episodes.name: The Throne of Sargon
episodes.overview: A villain from the past breaks into the Paxton Museum and attempts to take control of Alex forever.

2.name: Season 2
2.overview: The second season picks up with Alex rejoining the family as they continue working to undo the damage done by their greedy ancestors. But when something about Alex doesn't seem quite right, the family must band together to solve the mysteries that confront them, both on the road and within the walls of Briarstone Manor.
